function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different frames of reference for the cause of the pandemic leading to differential influences on beliefs and attitudes","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemics, lack of cooperation and trust in society","Mitigation":"Promote education on the actual cause of the pandemic, emphasize collective action and cooperation","Technologies":"Communication technologies for disseminating accurate information","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Socially constructed contagion frames of reference leading to different meanings and behaviors","Impact":"Prevention of the formation of cooperatives and trusting arrangements, hindering recovery and resiliency efforts","Mitigation":"Promote awareness of the social construction of frames of reference, encourage cooperation and trust-building initiatives","Technologies":"Social and community engagement platforms","People":"Affected communities","Owner":"Social organizations, non-profits, and local authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective response to natural disasters due to lack of resilience","Impact":"Inability to bounce back from adversity, prolonged recovery period","Mitigation":"Invest in disaster preparedness and resilience-building programs, promote self-sufficiency and community-based recovery efforts","Technologies":"Disaster management and early warning systems","People":"Communities facing natural disasters","Owner":"Disaster management agencies, local authorities"}]}
